quotes.text: The dead exist in the past, and I must tend to the future.
quotes.author: Lord Shen

quotes.text: Anything is possible when you have inner peace.
quotes.author: Master Shifu

quotes.text: I too came from humble beginnings.
quotes.author: The Chameleon

quotes.text: I'm not trying to turn you into me. I'm trying to turn you into you.
quotes.author: Master Shifu

quotes.text: He was so deadly, in fact, his enemies would go blind from over-exposure to pure awesomeness!
quotes.author: Po

quotes.text: Your story may not have such a happy beginning, but that doesn't make you who you are. It is the rest of your story, who you choose to be.
quotes.author: Soothsayer

quotes.text: Happiness must be taken, and I will take mine.
quotes.author: Lord Shen

quotes.text: Chi is a part of you.
quotes.author: Master Shifu
